short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The OKIOLABS Mirror Image Corrector extension allows you to correct the adjusted image that occurs when using Google Meet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üìù  The FREE OKIOLABS Mirror Image Corrector is an extension meant to work in conjunction with Google Meet that helps you enable and disable the adjusted mirror image so that you can accurately see what you are writing, drawing, presenting, discussing, or creating! 

üòÄ  The OKIOLABS Mirror Image Corrector gives you the power to toggle between the mirrored and non mirrored image. After downloading, you can use the extension by clicking the extension‚Äôs popup and then you will be able to enable and disable the mirrored image. 

üé•  The OKIOLABS Mirror Image Corrector helps you to explicate difficult math problems, model unique art techniques, and demonstrate good penmanship! 

üòÄ Google Meet automatically mirrors the preview window (sender‚Äôs video). The OKIOLABS Mirror Image Corrector lets you correct the preview window by toggling between the unmirrored image as well as the mirrored image.
